title: Aldermaston
summary: Aldermaston /ˈɔːldərmɑːstən/ is a village and civil parish in Berkshire, England. In the 2011 United Kingdom census, the parish had a population of 1015.[2] The village is in the Kennet Valley, and bounds Hampshire to the south. It is roughly equidistant from Newbury, Basingstoke and Reading, and is 46 miles (74 km) west-by-south-west of London.
